nodes.text: Grk'Urr'Akk was a Tusken Raider who was active during the waning years of the Republic Classic era. In 32 BBY, he commenced multiple raids on Gardulla Besadii the Elder's outposts. For this, the Hutt placed a bounty on his head of 3,000 credits alive and 1,500 dead. Jango Fett, a bounty hunter, claimed this bounty. If he had been taken alive, the Tusken would have been fed to Gardulla's pet Krayt dragon.
